doc:
Gray Haddock https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gray_Haddock 0 Gray G. Haddock (born August 11, 1972) is an American actor and film producer. He is known for voice roles such as Locus in Red vs. Blue, Roman Torchwick in RWBY, Sanosuke Sagara in the Rurouni Kenshin series, and Oreldo in Pumpkin Scissors. He is also the head of animation at Rooster Teeth, a production studio in Austin, Texas. Gray_G._Haddock ( born August_11_,_1972 ) is an_American_actor_and_film_producer . He is_known for voice_roles such_as Locus in Red_vs._Blue , Roman_Torchwick in RWBY , Sanosuke_Sagara in the_Rurouni_Kenshin_series , and Oreldo in Pumpkin_Scissors . He is also the_head of animation at Rooster_Teeth , a_production_studio in Austin , Texas .
